name: strider-rhnreg_ks
author: Gael Chamoulaud <gchamoul@redhat.com>
description: This module provides Custom Providers for Red Hat Network Registering.

parameters.name: profile_name
parameters.doc: The name the system should use in RHN or Satellite

parameters.name: username
parameters.doc: The username to use when registering the system

parameters.name: password
parameters.doc: The password to use when registering the system

parameters.name: activationkeys
parameters.doc: The activation key to use when registering the system (cannot be used with username and password)

parameters.name: hardware
parameters.doc: Whether or not the hardware information should be probed

parameters.name: packages
parameters.doc: Whether or not packages information should be probed

parameters.name: virtinfo
parameters.doc: Whether or not virtualiztion information should be uploaded

parameters.name: rhnsd
parameters.doc: Whether or not rhnsd should be started after registering

parameters.name: force
parameters.doc:
Should the registration be forced. Use this option with caution,
setting it true will cause the rhnreg_ks command to be run every time
runs.

parameters.name: proxy
parameters.doc: If needed, specify the HTTP Proxy

parameters.name: proxy_user
parameters.doc: Specify a username to use with an authenticated http proxy

parameters.name: proxy_password
parameters.doc: Specify a password to use with an authenticated http proxy

parameters.name: ssl_ca_cert
parameters.doc: Specify a file to use as the ssl CA cert

parameters.name: server_url
parameters.doc: Specify a url to use as a server

providers.name: rhnreg_ks
providers.doc:
This provider registers a machine with RHN or a Satellite Server.
If a machine is already registered it does nothing unless the force
parameter is set to true.

* Required binaries: `rhnreg_ks`.
